thoughts.text: We should check if we have internet connectivity and then try cloning the repository again.
thoughts.reasoning: If we do not have internet connectivity, we will not be able to clone the repository. Checking for internet connectivity will help us ensure that we are able to clone the repository. If we do have internet connectivity, we can try cloning the repository again.
thoughts.plan:
- Check for internet connectivity
- Try cloning the repository again
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that we have internet connectivity before trying to clone the repository again. I also need to make sure that we are using the correct URL for the repository.
thoughts.speak: We should check if we have internet connectivity and then try cloning the repository again.
